bill.title: Mandatory Health Coverage; Autism Spectrum Disorders; Behavioral Health
bill.description: Requires all accident and health or sickness insurers, mutual benefit societies, and health maintenance organizations to provide health care coverage and benefits for well-baby and well-child screening and diagnosis and treatment of autism spectrum disorders beginning after 07/01/2050. (SD2)

history.action: (S) The committee(s) on HTH/CPN has scheduled a public hearing on 02-08-12 2:45PM in conference room 229.
(S) The committee(s) on HTH/CPN deferred the measure until 02-14-12 10:00AM in conference room 229.
(S) The committee on HTH/CPN has rescheduled its decision making to 02-14-12 9:15AM in conference room 229.

(S) The committee(s) on CPN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in CPN were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, Taniguchi, Green; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Nishihara, Solomon ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Galuteria.

(S) The committee(s) on HTH recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in HTH were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Green, Baker, Chun Oakland; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Nishihara ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Shimabukuro, Wakai.
(S) Reported from HTH/CPN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2323) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
(S) The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 02-24-12 9:00AM in conference room 211.

(S) The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 12 Aye(s): Senator(s) Ige, Kidani, Chun Oakland, English, Espero, Fukunaga, Kahele, Kim, Kouchi, Ryan, Tokuda, Wakai; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Dela Cruz.
(S) Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2778) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).
(S) Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Kim . Noes, 1 (Senator(s) Slom). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
(H) Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 245) in amended form (SD 2).
(H) Referred to HLT, CPC, FIN, referral sheet 41
